title: Looking for Greta
content:
Sorry for the intrusion, and hope you don’t mind such message here.

For the cover of a new Typotheque catalogue we are looking for a girl / woman named Greta. Not Margaret, not Greet, but really Greta. We would like to photograph her in our studio, for which we offer a modest fee: cover the costs of transportation to The Hague, NL\*; offer 2 books of choice, and 2 t-shirts of choice from our collection. Additionally you’ll get a free license of our upcoming font Greta.

Please let Greta know.

How to proceed: please contact peter at typotheque dot com, and send your ID with the full name. We’ll then plan the details.

\* only available for European travel

See also:  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/site/font\_in\_development.php?id=54/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222256/http:/www.typotheque.com/site/font_in_development.php?id=54/)  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/news/newspaper\_typeface\_greta/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222256/http:/www.typotheque.com/news/newspaper_typeface_greta/)

comments.content:
